body.name: Yaheetech Queen Size Platform Bed Frame with Arrow Design Headboard,13 Inches Metal Mattress Foundation for Storage,No Box Spring Needed,Easy Assembly,Modern,Antique Gold
features: 【Arrow Design Headboard and Footboard】The stylish head and footboard of this metal-framed queen bed are embellished with chic arrow patterns, bringing artistic temperament and character to your bedroom. Aesthetic but practical, they provide extra protection to your body and keep the covers or blankets in place.

【Reliable Support】This queen size bed frame is built of metal slats, side rails and 10 sturdy legs, with a maximum weight capacity of 750 lb, ensuring a peaceful night's sleep without being bothered by squeaky sounds. 12 built-in metal slats provide optimal support for your mattress and bedding (no box spring required).

【Optimum Off-ground Height】The iron platform bed stands 13’’ off the floor, allowing easy access to the boxes and baskets underneath, also making you effortlessly get into or out of the bed, which is perfect for sleepers of all ages.
【Secure Your Mattress】The side rails of this metal bed frame are thoughtfully designed to be higher than the inserted slats, preventing the mattress from significantly sliding around.
【Fast & Easy Assembly】All the necessary parts, handy tools and easy-to-follow instructions are included in one efficiently packed box for simple set up within an hour, saving you time and hassle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Minimalist Metal Platform Bed with Arrow Design Headboard and Footboard Modernize your sleeping space with this metal platform bed with arrow design headboard and footboard. With a nod to minimalist design, this metal bed embraces a clean-lined appearance, stylish arrow design and sleek metallic finish that seamlessly blends with any home decor style. Constructed of a solid and durable metal frame, this bed frame features multiple strong support legs that provide optimal stability for any type of latex, memory foam or spring mattress without a clumpy box spring. Details like the powder-coated finish and non-slip foot caps all contribute to your safety and comfort. Plus, the platform bed frame creates sufficient under-the-bed storage space for your luggage, shoes, bags and other odds & ends, keeping your bedroom tidy and clutter-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice bed frame at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Purchased the full frame. Arrived in 1 day. Shipping box was surprisingly small. Everything but 3 parts were labeled and each part had a matching piece so it was easy to figure out the numbers. All the stickers numbering the parts are hidden when the mattress gets placed. It took me 45 minutes to put it together with the small tools. The bar “slats” have a place for a screw to hold them in but there were no instructions to use screws or hardware included for the final step. The bed is really great for the price and sturdy for everyday use. It probably wouldn’t withstand being jumped on and it will most likely have to be Allen wrench tightened every few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, very pretty and great price! Purchased 2. Easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and both my girls love this bed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great frame for the price. I love that it is high off the ground. Most platform beds are low to the ground. Doesn't shake or squeak. It did take a long time to put together and had to use my own wrench cause the one provided sucks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality frame for a great price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, quiet sturdy frame!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lot of pieces but VERY sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It arrived a lot earlier than expected. I was expecting this to be delivered in like 7-10 days, but it was here in like 3 days. Which was great because I needed a better frame with more support for our king mattress. The box was smaller than expected. There were ALOT of pieces, felt like I bought something from IKEA lol. At first, I questioned the quality, I mean it was only $100 for a whole frame with head/foot board. Figured I would get what I paid for. But surprisingly, This frame is impressive. We are bigger people with a 100# dog and it holds all of us without even a squeak. The third bar of support underneath also makes a difference. Very happy and would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We needed this for a spare room, aside form a bent support bar it was easy to put together, the bent bar did not change anything as it has so many extra supports i didnt even expect it to have. Looks great and priced perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bed frame went together easy in a couple hours. The frame is sturdy and am very happy with it.
